CONVENIENT LOCATION The Flavour of India is ideally located for residents of the area, Zurich and neighbouring areas; arriving and departing travellers and or groups. It is the only restaurat which offers authentic Indian cuisine in the area of Kloten, a mere 5 minutes drive from the Zurich Airport, Hotels Hilton, Mövenpick, Renaissance and the Novotel. It is a 5 minute walk from the Swiss Star Apartments, Hotels Welcome Inn, Allegra, Flyaway and various important commercial centres located in Kloten and the surrounding areas.
